Release notes for Kendo UI Professional v2018.1.221

Components

What's new

  • MaskedTextBox MVVM, when the mask can be parsed to number the widget is initialized with invalid mask (#3917)

What's fixed

  • Extend TypeScript definition of GridColumn command (#3217)
  • DataSource TypeScript group option should accept any parameter (#3203)

AutoComplete

What's fixed

  • kendo.ui.DropDownList: cannot set autoWidth in html (#3906)
  • AutoWidth is not applied when clearing manually in ComboBox and AutoComplete (#3888)
  • Wrong position of clear button on AutoComplete, ComboBox and MultiSelect in RTL in IE (#3832)
  • AutoComplete's dropdown is not properly resized when noDataTemplate is initially shown and the AutoWidth functionality is enabled. (#3813)

Button

What's fixed

  • kendoButton keeps active state if pressing Enter to trigger click and changing focus inside click event handler (#3908)

ButtonGroup

What's fixed

  • Badge method should return the value set for a certain button

Calendar

What's fixed

  • The Calandar selectDates method should clear the selected dates when an empty array is passed. (#3801)

Chart

What's fixed

  • Chart plotArea method should return ChartPlotArea in typescript (#3845)

ColorPicker

ComboBox

What's new

  • Screen Readers does not read value changed via keyboard when popup is closed (#3789)

What's fixed

  • Selecting item with virtual scrolling looses the actual item in Firefox (#2787)
  • DataSource Read is forced on select event of cascading comboboxes (#3943)
  • ComboBox and DropDownList Change event doesn't trigger with the Kendo UI 2018 R1 release (#3926)
  • kendo.ui.DropDownList: cannot set autoWidth in html (#3906)
  • AutoWidth is not applied when clearing manually in ComboBox and AutoComplete (#3888)
  • Wrong position of clear button on AutoComplete, ComboBox and MultiSelect in RTL in IE (#3832)
  • ValueMapper function gets called unexpectedly when ComboBox has initially selected value and the user changes the selection to one of the next items (#2803)
  • Filter is not cleared upon blur after selecting the value of the input (#3965)

DataSource

What's new

  • feat: add IsNullOrEmpty and IsNotNullOrEmpty filter operators

What's fixed

  • TypeScript: Missing inPlaceSort property for the DataSource in the definitions (#3866)

Dialog

What's fixed

  • Long Dialog title issues
  • Unexpected Dialog buttons left alignment when buttonLayout is set to normal (#3603)
  • Action buttons in Dialog are not expanded to the entire width when buttons' layout is stretched
  • Dialog content is trimmed, if it exceeds dialog dimensions (#3817)
  • Wrong Dialog height, if height property is set to a small value, e.g. 150px
  • Dialog title text falls on a second row in Office 365 and Nova themes
  • Missing Dialog buttons rounded corners in RTL with HighContrast Theme

DropDownList

What's new

  • Screen Readers does not read value changed via keyboard when popup is closed (#3789)

What's fixed

  • ComboBox and DropDownList Change event doesn't trigger with the Kendo UI 2018 R1 release (#3926)
  • OptionLabel is not selected when selecting a value that does not exist (#3915)
  • kendo.ui.DropDownList: cannot set autoWidth in html (#3906)
  • DropDownList autoWidth option cannot be set through data attribute (#3863)

Editor

What's fixed

  • Editor adds new lines within comment blocks after viewing the HTML and clicking Update (#3412)
  • Empty hyperlink is inserted when pressing enter at the beginning of link (#2980)
  • Missing styles for table in inline Editor
  • There are additional borders after adding tools in Editor that are hidden in specific scenarios
  • Unexpected buttons hiding on clicking Editor's content in SASS themes
  • Inline Editor toolbar buttons are not visible with Nova theme

FilterMenu

What's new

  • feat: add IsNullOrEmpty and IsNotNullOrEmpty filter operators

Gantt

What's fixed

  • Gantt Task edit dialog appearance issues in RTL

Grid

What's fixed

  • Styled checkbox not clickable in Grid Batch edit mode
  • Grid does not show data if pager option 'All' is selected (#3924)
  • Dropdowns in Grid filter menu are not closed on devices with touch and mouse (#3835)
  • Kendo Grid data not refresh after Menu Filter clear (#3756)
  • Grid pageSize(All) not persisting after adding a new record (#3424)
  • Validation tooltip visible with correct data in the Grid (#3385)
  • Grid editing form doesn't close with filtered data containing only 1 item
  • Grid does not persist selection after cancelling popup editing (#3928)

ListView

What's fixed

  • ListView drag events could not be detected on Windows device with capactive touch screen in IE and Edge browsers. (#3222)

Localization

MVVM

What's fixed

  • DropDownList autoWidth option cannot be set through data attribute (#3863)

MediaPlayer

What's fixed

  • fullScreen property of the MediaPlayer doesn't work (#3967)
  • MediaPlayer TypeScript functions have Void as a return (#3904)

MultiSelect

What's fixed

  • MultiSelect throws an error for initially selected items with autoBind: "false" and grouping (#3937)
  • kendo.ui.DropDownList: cannot set autoWidth in html (#3906)
  • Wrong position of clear button on AutoComplete, ComboBox and MultiSelect in RTL in IE (#3832)
  • All items cannot be selected with keyboard Shift + Arrow key in MultiSelect (#3662)
  • Values are not selected with autoBind: "false"

NumericTextBox

What's fixed

  • NumericTextBox does not reflect changes applied through setOptions (#3945)
  • HTML attributes are cleared from input element on form reset (#3912)
  • The NumericTextBox does not allow writing or paste decimals with decimals 0 and restrictDecimals to false. (#3898)
  • NumericTextBox without spinners has a gray background

Pager

What's fixed

  • Grid does not show data if pager option 'All' is selected (#3924)
  • Grid pageSize(All) not persisting after adding a new record (#3424)

PanelBar

What's new

  • Add templates support for PanelBar in MVVM (#2832)

Scheduler

Spreadsheet

What's fixed

  • Horizontal scrollbar appears under Spreadsheet toolbar with less themes
  • Spreadsheet's Format dialog content is cut in Nova theme
  • Broken appearance of Spreadsheet's sheets bar in all themes, when there are scroll buttons

TabStrip

What's fixed

  • Setting animation to false does not completely disable TabStrip animation in IE and Edge for Material theme (#3919)

ToolBar

What's fixed

  • Wrong color of split button arrow by click (#3954)
  • Disabled Button in Toolbar should have focus stylization (#3923)
  • Cannot toggle checkboxes in ToolBar overflow popup (#3192)
  • Disabled ToolBar SplitButton can be opened with the keyboard (#1566)
  • Inconsistent filling of the available space on init and on re-size (#1341)
  • Inconsistent states appearance of ToolBar buttons

TreeList

What's fixed

  • TreeList does not fire expand/collapse events when using keyboard navigation (#3883)

TreeView

What's new

  • Update indeterminate state of checkboxes when dataSource is filtered (#3910)

Window

What's fixed

  • Disabled anchor in Window prevents Tab navigation to other focusable elements (IE) (#3938)
